name: DB+ Portfolio Studio
description: DB+ Architectural Studio: Your expert projecting and technological architects. Offering comprehensive end-to-end architectural, urban planning, MEP & structural engineering, and project support services across the UK. Specialising in precise calculations for all building installations (HVAC, electrical, plumbing, drainage, PV systems, fire safety, thermal load, sound insulation) and comprehensive structural analysis. Our expertise extends to urbanisation masterplanning and infrastructure coordination. Leveraging advanced BIM technology for innovative, sustainable, and functional designs. An ideal partner for developers, contractors, and intermediary architectural studios seeking high-quality technical collaboration and project delivery. Proudly serving Corby, Kettering, Wellingborough, Irthlingborough, Rushden, Market Harborough, Desborough, Broughton, Oundle, Harringworth, Ashley, Brixworth, Thrapston, Woodford, Burton Latimer, Walgrave, and surrounding areas.
